com.yworks.yfiles.layout.tree

Class BalloonLayoutData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.layout.LayoutData
      • com.yworks.yfiles.layout.tree.BalloonLayoutData

  • public class BalloonLayoutData
extends LayoutData
    Specifies custom data for the BalloonLayout.

      • apply

        public void apply(LayoutGraphAdapter adapter,
                  ILayoutAlgorithm layout,
                  CopiedLayoutGraph layoutGraph)
        Description copied from class: LayoutData
        Applies this layout data to the specified layoutGraphAdapter.
        Specified by:
        apply in class LayoutData
        Parameters:
        adapter - The adapter to add the layout data to.
        layout - The layout that shall use this layout data.
        layoutGraph - The layout graph used for the layout calculation.

      • getTreeRoot

        public final ItemMapping<INode,Boolean> getTreeRoot()
        Gets the mapping for marking the node that will be used as root node of the tree.

        The custom root node selection induced by this property is only considered if the root node policy is set to RootNodePolicy.SELECTED_ROOT.

        Returns:
        The TreeRoot.
        See Also:
        BalloonLayout.SELECTED_ROOT_DPKEY, setTreeRoot(ItemMapping)

      • setTreeRoot

        public final void setTreeRoot(ItemMapping<INode,Boolean> value)
        Sets the mapping for marking the node that will be used as root node of the tree.

        The custom root node selection induced by this property is only considered if the root node policy is set to RootNodePolicy.SELECTED_ROOT.

        Parameters:
        value - The TreeRoot to set.
        See Also:
        BalloonLayout.SELECTED_ROOT_DPKEY, getTreeRoot()
